aboutText: We are a company with a keen focus on your dream of starting a family. Our mission is to create a favorable environment for those seeking the path to parenthood through egg donation and surrogacy.
Мы оказываем услуги по суррогатному мате: We provide services in surrogacy and egg donation in more than 20 countries.
Количество успешно завершенных процедур: Number of successfully completed surrogacy procedures by our company.
Процент успешных беременностей благодаря: Percentage of successful pregnancies thanks to high-quality donor eggs.
Мы помогли более 1000 женщинам стать мам: We have helped more than 1000 women become mothers.
Удовлетворенных клиентов, мы гордимся вы: Satisfied clients, we take pride in the high level of customer satisfaction and gratitude.
Количество детей, родившихся благодаря н: Number of children born thanks to our company.
serviceText: Our professional services are designed to make your path to parenthood more accessible and safe.
condition2: Donors must be between the ages of 18 and 30. We adhere to this age range to ensure optimal conditions for successful pregnancies and donor health.
condition3: We require our donors to be in excellent physical and psychological condition. This includes mandatory medical checks and a psychological health assessment.
condition4: Potential donors must have a successful history of pregnancy and childbirth. This helps ensure optimal chances for a successful pregnancy for the recipient.
condition5: Donors must have a healthy weight and fall within a normal BMI range. Excess weight can increase the risks for both the donor and the future mother's health.
condition6: For participation in the egg donation program, maintaining a well-groomed and healthy appearance is also important.
Станьте частью чуда: Become a Part of the Miracle
Станьте донором и подарите радость родит: Become a donor and bring the joy of parenthood to others
Мы подберем для вас идеального донора и: We will find the perfect donor for you and support you every step of the way
Заполните анкету на сайте и узнайте боль: Fill out the form on the website and learn more about surrogacy.
Присоединитесь к нам в миссии создания с: Join us in the mission of building families
Хотите посмотреть доноров?: Would you like to see the donors?
Выберите свой путь: Стать донором или Ст: Choose your path: Become a donor or Become a surrogacy client
Просматривайте наших потенциальных донор: Browse our potential donors and choose the perfect candidate for your family
condition1: Our professional services are designed to make your path to parenthood more accessible and safer.
